price: 107 Quant à ceux dont les visages s’éclaireront, ils seront admis au Paradis pour l’éternité.
arabic: وَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ٱبۡيَضَّتۡ وُجُوهُهُمۡ فَفِي رَحۡمَةِ ٱللَّهِۖ هُمۡ فِيهَا خَٰلِدُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: wa-ammā alladhīna ib'yaḍḍat wujūhuhum fafī raḥmati al-lahi hum fīhā khālidūna
